about_1: Zipo Aid Investment Trader provides reliable, consistent and profitable financial assistance to our clients around the world. Investments in our trading platforms are securely secured and managed only by our experienced traders to ensure better risk management and profitable trading.
about_2: Stay connected to the market with our web mobile wallet. Featuring advanced order types and analytical tools for experienced traders, as well as a simple buy & sell interface for those just getting started.
about_3: We provide premium access to crypto trading for both individuals and institutions through high liquidity, reliable order execution and constant uptime.

t_c_caption: In using this website you are deemed to have read and agreed to the following terms and conditions:
privacy_body: Zipo Aid Investments Limited knows that you care how information about you is used and shared. Hence we make a strong commitment to protect and respect the privacy principles regarding the information that you provide. All the data given by a member to Zipo Aid Investments Limited will be only privately used and not disclosed to any third parties. We will not sell, share, or rent your personal information to any third party or use your e-mail address for unsolicited mail. Any emails sent by this Company will only be in connection with the provision of agreed services.
guidance_body: Trading carry a high degree of risk, and may not be suitable for all investors. Before deciding to invest in Zipo Aid Investments Limited you should carefully consider your financial condition and your level of experience. You should be aware of all the risks associated with trading and seek advice from an independent financial adviser if you have any doubts. The possibility exists that you could sustain a loss of some or all of your initial investment and therefore you should not invest money that you cannot afford to lose. You are investing at your own risk and you agree that a past performance is not a guarantee for the same future performance.
u_o_s_body: SPAM violators will be permanently removed from the site with immediate effect. Zipo Aid Investments Limited reserves the right to accept or decline any member for membership without explanation.
r_g_body: Zipo Aid Invesments Limited is available only to the members of the site. You agree to be of legal age in your country to join this site and in all the cases your minimum age must be 18 years. Every deposit is considered to be a private transaction between Zipo Aid Investments Limited and its member.
d_l_body: We reserve the right to change the rules, commissions and rates of the program at any time and at our sole discretion without notice, especially in order to respect the integrity of the members' interests as a whole. You agree that it is your sole responsibility to review the current terms.
goal_body: Let's help you save your future and stress with the power of diversified asset management system.
mission_body: We are a global private markets investor with strong trading roots and a long, well-established track record. We are committed to building long-term relationships with our investors, investment partners and colleagues based on trust, openness, respect and the highest standards of integrity and professionalism.
mission_title_1: We will be the private markets partner of choice for our investors by:
m_t_b: Ensuring that our interests are aligned with theirs
m_t_c: Working collaboratively and openly to exceed expectations through best-in-class private markets solutions, investor reporting and client service
mission_title_2: We will be a preferred investment partner by:
m_t_d: Employing a professional, fact-based investment approach grounded in a deep understanding of private markets
m_t_e: Being a trusted, collaborative, long-term partner
m_t_f: Providing a global investment perspective informed by our long and successful history of private markets investing
mission_title_3: We will attract, develop and retain exceptional professionals by:
m_t_g: Providing and reinforcing a one-team culture that is both supportive and challenging
m_t_h: Ensuring that our interactions are founded on honesty and mutual respect
m_t_i: Expecting, recognizing and celebrating excellence in everything we do
